practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak this morning
I was trying to learn this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上想和你说话
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak with you this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上开始考虑一些事
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about something this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我期待今天早上和你说话
practice_phrases.target: I was looking forward to speaking with you this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上想和你说话但是我累了
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak with you this morning but I was tired

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上开始仔细考虑如何说英语
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about how to speak English carefully this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上想向你解释我在想什么但是我累了
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to explain what I was thinking about to you this morning but I was tired
